tool_description: Integrate campaign service and create 500+ discount scenerios for your end users
name: Campaign Service
title: Campaign Service

api_list.name: List Active Campaigns
api_list.description: Get the list of active campaigns to show which campaigns are available
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://campaign-service2.p.rapidapi.com/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "campaign-service2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://campaign-service2.p.rapidapi.com/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "campaign-service2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
